sentences.en: A long cobbled street bisects the town from east to west.
sentences.cn: 一条长长的鹅卵石街道从东向西把小镇一分为二。

sentences.en: The new road will bisect the town.
sentences.cn: 新马路将把城市分成两部分.

sentences.en: We'll bisect his trail in sixty seconds. Look for the red paint!
sentences.cn: 六十秒钟之后我们就会找到他的行踪, 注意找红油漆记号!

words.tran_cn: 两断；对切；二等分的一半

words: go halves with sb. in sth.

trans.tran_en: to divide something into two equal parts

trans.tran_cn: 把…一分为二，把…二等分，与…相交叉
trans.tran_en: to divide something into two equal parts
